title: event.videos.patch
description: Describes the request body to update one or more videos on an event.

id.description: The id of the video to update.

url.description: The unique url of the video. Currently only Youtube and Vimeo sources are allowed.

language.description:
The language of the video.
Can be one of `nl`, `fr`, `de`, or `en`.

copyrightHolder.description: The copyright holder of the video source.
